rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance leading to the courtyard and garden. Vastu-compliant alignment with the North.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean-style living room adjacent to central courtyard for optimal light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open kitchen with views of the garden and courtyard. Vastu-compliant placement near the entrance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom on ground floor for privacy and comfort, with direct access to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Additional bedroom suitable for occasional use, located near the master bedroom for efficient circulation.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light and ventilation, Vastu compliant.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for master bedroom with Vastu-compliant layout.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional sleeping area on upper floor, maintaining privacy and tranquility.

rooms.name: Study/Occupational Room
rooms.description: Dedicated study space with ample daylight from window placements following Vastu principles.

openings.description: Provides a view of the garden and courtyard while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage accommodating two vehicles with ample storage space.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage for cleaning equipment and additional supplies.
